mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CONFIRM_APPLICATION ( apply_dt, start_date, end_date, weekly_hours, regular_wage, child_name, child_resi_regi_number, child_birth_date, registration_number, name, response_name, response_phone_number, status_code, center_id, user_id ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{weeklyHours}, #{regularWage}, #{childName}, #{childResiRegiNumber}, #{childBirthDate}, #{registrationNumber}, #{name}, #{responseName}, #{responsePhoneNumber}, #{statusCode}, #{centerId}, #{userId} )
